Type.description: Type of the account (e.g., income, expense)

UpdatedDateUTC.description: Date and time of the last update to the account

SystemAccount.description: Indicates if the account is a system account

BankAccountType.description: Type of bank account (e.g., savings, checking)

TaxType.description: Tax type associated with the account

Description.description: Description or name of the account

BankAccountNumber.description: Bank account number associated with the account

ShowInExpenseClaims.description: Indicates if this account can be shown in expense claims

CurrencyCode.description: Currency code used by the account

ReportingCode.description: Reporting code associated with the account

EnablePaymentsToAccount.description: Indicates if payments are enabled to this account

HasAttachments.description: Indicates if the account has attachments
